attributes.action: Abolish the one penny piece and give them all to charity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am sick of everything being priced at £xx.99, just to give the impression of a bargain. If goods were priced at a round figure, the annoying, wallet clogging penny could be removed from circulation and maybe given to charity. There are an estimated ten and a half billion pennies (approx £105,000,000,000) in circulation which could be put to better use. So, companies, round your prices up by a penny and between us WE CAN RAISE MORE THAN ANY OTHER FUNDRAISING ACTIVITY EVER!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
